### [dv.loader](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/dv.loader/)
The {dv.loader} package facilitates data loading from either a local or remote source.

![](images/dv.filter.png){width="125"}
:::

### [dv.filter](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/dv.filter/)
The {dv.filter} package enables dynamic data filtering.
:::

![](images/dv.manager.png){width="125"}

### [dv.manager](dv.manager.qmd)  
The {dv.manager} package is designed to make it quick and easy to create and deploy Shiny applications containing DaVinci modules.
